description:
Is it July 22nd for the fourth time? Hizuru Minakata, the woman on the ferry and a Hitogashima Island native, is returning home for the first time in fourteen years, hoping to solve the mysterious message that was left on her phone.
Aware of the existence of the shadows and Heine, she joins Nezu, the hunter on the island, and learns that the shadows have taken over.
Source: Disney+
